title: Lag with low pin "30" and 60+ fps
body:
in the last month or so i have had that seems to be really bad lag spike or ping spike. but heres the thing my ping isnt bad and doesn't go above 80 into the 100s or 1000s my internet shows stable connection all the way through as well . my pc specs are above and beyond whats needed for the game 
CPU Type
AMD FX(tm)-8350 Eight-Core Processor

Graphics Chipset
Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics Memory Size
8192 MB Memory Type GDDR5

System Memory
16 GB

Windows Version
Windows 10 (64 bit)

any ways so what happens is this so i will connect fine join in every thing is good be playing for a unsiad amount of time and then attacks stop happening and every thing is still moving no fps lag or ping but then a split second or a few go bye and then every thing gets cought up and most of the time i die it makes it really hard to play when at any moment it can become unplayable . drivers are all up to date no virus tried reinstalling game reinstaled windows just to try and nothing has worked at all please help

replies.body: You might have degrading connection to the game server, so you can see delay regardless of how good your fps is.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) so we can get an overview of your specific issue.  Let me know your results!

:P
what to tell me how to do it

Ofc! Becouse he knows how to do that :>
Rito doesnt care!
